articles.description: NEW DELHI: Smartphone maker Xiaomi launched its mid-range smartphones -- Mi 10T and Mi 10T Pro in India in October last year. Now the company has started rolling out Android 11 update for both the smartphones in India. The interesting thing to note here is th…

articles.title: Google brings desktop Search redesign to music queries - 9to5Google

articles.content: Last month, Google revamped Search on Android, iOS, and mobile with a focus on making results easier to read. A similar look has long been in development for the desktop web, with users able to previ… [+1417 chars]
